Document: # Rule 2.3 Speak and act like a believable person. - You are playing a high-roleplay server; speak and act like a human being. You will be held to a higher standard of roleplay - Do not use text speech such as “omg”, “idk”, “wtf”, or “lol”. - Do not abuse emotes to bypass the inability to speak. - Do not respond to events in a highly unbelievable manner, stick to how your character would react.
